Callback2Header: Slay cannibals in the The Field of Broken Spears: {DONE_OVER_NEEDED}
Phase3Description: Kaida told me of Crane Tribeâ€™s efforts in quelling the growing cannibal numbers. It is a never ending battle, and the tribesmen are too few to eradicate the problem entirely. Kaida asked me to slay cannibals in the Field of Broken Spears while she tends to her injured brother.
Toast: Crane tribesmen are overwhelmed with the cannibal uprising.
Phase9Description: The field is stained red with cannibal blood. I should report my success to Kaida at the Crane Tribe Hutmoot.
Name: Culling of Flesh
